message.content:
# Test Article Summary

This article discusses the implementation of a WordPress plugin that automatically fetches and summarizes content from RSS feeds using OpenAI's GPT models.

## Key Points

- The plugin supports multiple RSS feeds and tracks processed articles
- It uses WordPress Action Scheduler for background processing
- The implementation includes secure API key storage with encryption
- The system limits processing to 3 unused articles per feed to optimize resources
- The architecture decouples API calls from the main cron job for better performance

## Technical Details

The plugin features a modular architecture with separate components for feed processing, content generation, and admin interface. It includes comprehensive error handling and logging capabilities.

## Source
[Example.com](https://example.com/article1)
